MDN Inbound and Outbound Trains Delayed (Update)
MDN inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 30 minutes behind schedule due to track construction. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train. (Updated 4:23pm)
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF #1241 - Delayed/Expressing

BNSF train #1241, scheduled to arrive Aurora at 4:27PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule and will express from Naperville to Aurora due to earlier positive train control issues. Train #1239 will accommodate customers at intermediate stops.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UP-West #11 Will Not Operate On Sunday, November 23.  - Scheduled Track Construction

Due to scheduled CN railroad track construction taking place Sunday, November 23, UP-West train #11 will not operate. UP-West service will resume normal operations for the start of rush hour on Monday morning November 24.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

UPW Train #50- Delayed
UPW train #50, scheduled to arrive Ogilvie Transportation Center at 2:53 PM. Is on the move and operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to track construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Morton Grove New Shelter Opens December 15. 2025

The new shelter at the Morton Grove station will open on December 15. The old shelter will be locked and closed. Signage will be posted directing passengers to the new shelter. We appreciate your patience and understanding.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

BNSF 1235 Delayed/Operational Change

BNSF train #1235 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 3:57 PM, may be operating 30 to 35 minutes behind schedule and will not operate past Naperville due to earlier positive train control issues. Trains 1239 and 1241 will accommodate customers towards Aurora.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID - Midlothian Station Platform Construction Notification (UPDATE)
Beginning Wednesday, November 12, the south half of Platform 1 (inbound platform) will be closed for rehabilitation. Passengers must use the north half of Platform 1 to board the trains.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW Train #635 On The Move

UPNW train #635 scheduled to arrive Des Plaines at 4:10 PM, is on the move and operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to positive train control issues. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

Track Construction Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 25 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning June 2, 2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction.

Beginning June 2,2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction. ADA access will resume late 2025. Passengers requiring full accessibility should use Crystal Lake station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is fully restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF #1268 - Delayed/Expressing

BNSF train 1268 scheduled to depart Aurora at 3:40PM may be operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule and will express from Aurora to Chicago due to earlier positive train control issues. Train 1276 will accommodate customers at intermediate stops.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Grayslake Platform Rehabilitation Project

Beginning Saturday, October 25 through mid-December, the platform at Grayslake/Lake Street station will be replaced. Approximately 400 feet of the platform from the paid parking to the east end of the platform will be out of service. In addition, the staircase at the east end of the platform will also be out of service. Please use caution near the work area during this time.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, November 22 through Sunday, November 23. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Forest Glen Station Rehabilitation

Beginning Wednesday, October 22, the northwest staircase at Forest Glen station will be out of service for rehabilitation for 6-8 weeks. Please use the southwest staircase at North Elston Ave, to access Platform 2.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF #1272 - Originating at Naperville
BNSF train 1272, scheduled to depart Aurora at 4:10PM, will originate at Naperville due to earlier positive train control issues. Train 1276 is the next scheduled train to depart Aurora at 4:40PM.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Entry Closed - Canopies Refurbished

Passengers will not have access to east station and east parking lot platform entry November 10 through winter 2026 at University Park while canopies are being refurbished. Passengers have full access to west station and west parking lot platform entry.
